<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Expert Cathartic Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=2967) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 195 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Cathartic Mage](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=97)

**Prerequisites**
[Basic Cathartic Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=2964)

</column>

---

You gain the [expert spellcasting benefits](/Rules.aspx?ID=170).

<title level="2">Expert Cathartic Spellcasting leads to...</title>
[Master Cathartic Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=2969)
name: Expert Cathartic Spellcasting
